title: The Nutcracker (The Ballet)
brief_description: Mikhail Baryshnikov debuts his choreographic talent as well as dancing prowess in this timeless Hoffmann fairytale ballet. Performed by the American Ballet theatre to the classic Tschaikovsky score, “The Nutcracker” features Gelsey Kirkland as the young girl Clara, Baryshnikov as the Prince and Alexander Minz as Drosselmeyer, Clara’s godfather who conjures up an end to her dream. With the National Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Kenneth Schermerhorn.
